# Mean & Median

***

**Sample mean:**
$$
\overline{Y} = \frac{1}{n}\sum^{n}_{i=1}Y_{i}
$$

. . .

You can create the function:
```{r}
#| echo: true
sample_mean <- function(y){sum(y)/length(y)}
```

. . .

Or simply use a predefined one:

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false
mean()
```

***

**Sample variance (unbiased):**
$$
S^{2} = \frac{1}{n-1}\sum^{n}_{i=1}(Y_{i}-\overline{Y})^{2}
$$


***

```{r}
library(palmerpenguins)
```
